Html: With the Beta13.1 release, the ItemCache.xml file became a MB large. It may just be my computer, but it takes several seconds to delete an item and 10s of seconds to bring up the item editor. Is there a way to trim the ItemCache file for mage items only? Or maybe a more efficient way to store the files? Or do I just need a new computer? ><

Do you have an exceptionally slow computer or something? The first time you open the ItemCache, it should take several seconds (maybe 10). Other than that, all item loading/editing/deleting should be near-instant. In what way are you deleting an item that takes several seconds?
I see you've made changes to some of the item lookup code. Trying out the newest build now. =P
Nice... the first time opening, it took like 20 seconds+, but now it's almost instant. Great work once again!
